participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and sometimes impulsive, Jake is an easygoing person who values personal connections and experiences over appearances. He has a passion for sports and music.
participant_1.background: I don't need to look my best to visit my mom. I play for the Philadelphia Eagles. My first guitar was my favorite thing I ever bought. I like long walks on the beach. I am sometimes unable to control my anger and end up saying hurtful things.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Emily often contemplates her life choices. She prefers a quiet life but has a creative side that shines through her music and art.
participant_2.background: I have moved a lot, but I always take my favorite green clothes with me. I'm not a morning person, I like to take my time getting ready in the morning. I'm working on finding a new job and trying to figure out what I want to do with my life. I'm a night owl, but I'm an introvert so I don't go out much or anything. I'm worried about not being able to keep any food down and losing too much weight.

content.text: Hi! Not much, just trying to figure out what I want to do with my life.
Oh, that's tough. What are you thinking about doing?
I'm not sure, I'm thinking about going back to school or maybe starting a business.
Oh, that's cool. I'm sure you'll figure it out.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go for walks on the beach, I like to read, and I love to play music.
Oh, that's cool. I like to go for walks on the beach too.
I play the guitar and the piano.
Oh, that's awesome. I used to play the piano, but I haven't in a long time.
You should start playing again! It's so much fun.
Yeah, I know. I'll have to try it sometime.
Okay, well I should probably get going. It was nice talking to you!
Yeah, it was nice talking to you too. Have a good night!
